{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Airspan |model=AirUnity 545 |revision=eNB25 (B41HL) |is_manuf=No |fcc_date=02/14/2017 |fcc_id=PIDAU545ENB25,2ACKD-WIM1200-20-A,P27LC4RT,PPD-QCNFA344A, |type=4G LTE router, LTE modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX6SX;MCIMX6X, 2EVN10AB; |cpu1_cspeed=792 |cpu2_brand=Qualcomm |cpu2_model=FSM9916 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Kingston |fla1_model=EMMC04G-M627 |fla2=4 GiB |fla2_brand=SanDisk |fla2_model=SDIN7DP2-4G |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646D-BYK0 |ram1_num=2 |ram2=2 GiB |ram2_brand=Samsung |ram2_model=K4B4G1646D-BYK0 |ram2_num=4 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=3 |wi1_module=Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA344A |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (NGFF) |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA6174A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=SerComm Ninja LTE Module (LC4R-T) |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (USB 2.0/UART) |wi2_chip1_brand=GCT Semiconductor |wi2_chip1_model=GDM7243Q |wi2_802dot11_protocols=cellular |wi2_ant_conn=SMA |eth_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |eth_chip1_model=AR8033;AR8033-AL1B; |eth_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8033;AR8033-AL1B; |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=PLIC;Altera;51M60Z;E64C5N, N CADA6, 1725A;1; <!--Embedded UICC Chip;SIM Card;--> |flags=LTE Cat.6, femtocell, SIM Card slot, |stock_boot=U-Boot;Secure Boot; |stock_os=Linux;4.1.15;airunity; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=AU-WIFI |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |oui=28:56:5A |oui_eth=00:A0:0A |wi3_module=Qualcomm Femtocell B41 |wi3_module_if=USB 2.0 |wi3_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi3_chip1_model=FTR8900 |wi3_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi3_chip2_model=FTR8900 |wi3_802dot11_protocols=cellular |wi3_ant_conn=SMA }} {{TagLine|LTE Mobile Digital Station}}
*'''AirUnity 545''' (''Sprint Magic Box'') *'''AirUnity 546''' (B41HL), BH (B41HL, B25) â€¢ [https://fccid.io/PIDAU545ENB25/Label/Label-label-location-3730174 FCC Label] :CPU: [[NXP]] ([[Freescale]]) MCIMX6X2EVN10AB @792MHz :WLAN: [[Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA344A]] NGFF M.2 :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PPD-QCNFA344A PPD-QCNFA344A] (05/01/2015) :P/N: ''Hon Hai'' ([[Foxconn]]) T77H644.01
===Overview=== *Device includes two distinct boards within. Primary board used for system :control and carrier traffic relaying drivin by the LC4R-T modem. *Second board is dedicated to Femtocell operation. Boards are connected using a 14 pin :ribbon connector for 12v power along with a STP RJ45 cable for network access. *SSDP packets generated from the relay board for controlling the femtocell board. *System contains tamper detection circuitry. It appears booting the relay board :disconnected from the display and femtocell board will set it off. :Also booting the unit with the case open will set it off.
===Serial=== *Relay Board: U-Boot console disabled. :3.3v TTL UART located on right hand side (back PCB facing) :Pin1 (RX) - Pin2 (TX) - Pin3 (GND) :115200 Baud *Femtocell Board: :RS232 port is connected to TTL UART with active voltage levels and no console output. :UART running at 1.8V stepped up to 3.3V prior to the RS232 controller. Solder points exist for a second RS232 controller however no components have been placed.
__NOTOC__
